channel.title: Command Error
channel.description: Trying to make a command ::yell {Message} show up as [{Name}] - {Message} but I get the following error when I try: [code]client.java:7167: operator - cannot be applied to java.lang.String,char yell("["+playerName+"]" - Character.toUpperCase( text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Command Error
item.dc:creator: @F3arMagick F3arMagick
item.description:
@F3arMagick wrote:

Trying to make a command ::yell {Message} show up as [{Name}] - {Message} but I get the following error when I try:

client.java:7167: operator - cannot be applied to java.lang.String,char yell("["+playerName+"]" - Character.toUpperCase( text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
